name: Lead The School! Unofficial APK Port!
name_original: Lead The School! Unofficial APK Port!
description:
The Fun, Epik Boss Rush, Now (unofficially) on android devices!

I used htmlifier to and AppsGeyser to test out LtS on android and it works!

I didn't use turbowarp packager this time, but if I port my games to android and apple, I definitely will!

Original Lead the School Game by: HeyoGame/Bioplant and Victando

Join Bioplant's Discord!


Join LtS Discord for official news and stuff!
